languages.text: "Хотя последнее уже не актуально с тех пор, как Ангел Императора присоединился к вам. Какое еще боевое подкрепление можно желать, дредноут?"
"Although, that last part stopped being a concern the moment an Angel of the Emperor joined you. What other reinforcements would we even want, a Dreadnought?"
languages.original_text: "Хотя последнее уже не актуально с тех пор, как Ангел Императора присоединился к вам. Какое еще боевое подкрепление можно желать, дредноут?"

traits.locale_text: "Although that last part stopped being a concern the moment an Angel of the Emperor joined you. What other reinforcements would we even want, a Dreadnought?"
"Although that last part stopped being a concern the moment an Angel of the Emperor joined you. What other reinforcements would we even want, a Dreadnought?"
"Although, that last part stopped being a concern the moment an Angel of the Emperor joined you. What other reinforcements would we even want, a Dreadnought?"
"Although, that last part stopped being a concern the moment an Angel of the Emperor joined you. What other reinforcements would we even want, a Dreadnought?"
"Although, that last part stopped being a concern the moment an Angel of the Emperor joined you. What other reinforcements would we even want, a Dreadnought?"
"Although, that last part stopped being a concern the moment an Angel of the Emperor joined you. What other reinforcements would we even want, a Dreadnought?"

languages.text: 「もっとも、その問題は『皇帝の天使』が加わった瞬間に、気にする必要もなくなりましたが。これ以上どんな援軍が必要だっていうんです？ドレッドノートでも呼びましょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Although, that last part stopped being a concern the moment an Angel of the Emperor joined you. What other reinforcements would we even want, a Dreadnought?"

traits.locale_text: 「もっとも、その問題は『皇帝の天使』が加わった瞬間に、気にする必要もなくなりましたが。これ以上どんな援軍が必要だっていうんです？ドレッドノートでも呼びましょうか？」

languages.text: "Obwohl Letzteres kein Thema mehr ist, seit sich Euch Engel des Imperators angeschlossen hat. Welche andere Verstärkung sollten wir da noch wollen? Einen Dreadnought?"
languages.original_text: "Although, that last part stopped being a concern the moment an Angel of the Emperor joined you. What other reinforcements would we even want, a Dreadnought?"

traits.locale_text: "Obwohl Letzteres kein Thema mehr ist, seit sich Euch Engel des Imperators angeschlossen hat. Welche andere Verstärkung sollten wir da noch wollen? Einen Dreadnought?"

languages.text: « Cependant, ce dernier aspect n'est plus une priorité depuis qu'un ange de l'Empereur a accepté de rejoindre vos rangs. Quels autres renforts pourrions-nous donc espérer, un Dreadnought ? »
languages.original_text: "Although, that last part stopped being a concern the moment an Angel of the Emperor joined you. What other reinforcements would we even want, a Dreadnought?"

traits.locale_text: « Cependant, ce dernier aspect n'est plus une priorité depuis qu'un ange de l'Empereur a accepté de rejoindre vos rangs. Quels autres renforts pourrions-nous donc espérer, un Dreadnought ? »

languages.text: «Aunque esa última parte dejó de preocuparme en cuanto vi que un ángel del Emperador se unía al grupo. ¿Qué más refuerzos podríamos querer, un dreadnought?».
languages.original_text: "Although, that last part stopped being a concern the moment an Angel of the Emperor joined you. What other reinforcements would we even want, a Dreadnought?"

traits.locale_text: «Aunque esa última parte dejó de preocuparme en cuanto vi que un ángel del Emperador se unía al grupo. ¿Qué más refuerzos podríamos querer, un dreadnought?».

languages.text: “不过，既然连帝皇的天使都来到了你身边，战士方面的问题就不用再担心了。毕竟，我们还能奢求什么别的增援呢？总不至于是无畏机甲吧？”
languages.original_text: "Although, that last part stopped being a concern the moment an Angel of the Emperor joined you. What other reinforcements would we even want, a Dreadnought?"

traits.locale_text: “不过，既然连帝皇的天使都来到了你身边，战士方面的问题就不用再担心了。毕竟，我们还能奢求什么别的增援呢？总不至于是无畏机甲吧？”

languages.text: "Gerçi bir İmparator'un Meleği size katıldığından beri bu son kısmı sorun etmeye gerek kalmadı. Daha ne tür bir takviye isteyecektik ki? Bir Dretnot mu"
languages.original_text: "Although, that last part stopped being a concern the moment an Angel of the Emperor joined you. What other reinforcements would we even want, a Dreadnought?"

traits.locale_text: "Gerçi bir İmparator'un Meleği size katıldığından beri bu son kısmı sorun etmeye gerek kalmadı. Daha ne tür bir takviye isteyecektik ki? Bir Dretnot mu"

languages.original_text: "Although, that last part stopped being a concern the moment an Angel of the Emperor joined you. What other reinforcements would we even want, a Dreadnought?"
